DOC.detailed_description: Paclitaxel design block mechanism cell division cancer cell , may cause die . If find eligible take part study , begin treatment . You radiation treatment pelvis ( hip area ) every day ( Monday - Friday ) total 25 treatment . Each treatment take 20 minute complete . After radiation treatment , receive type radiation call `` vaginal cuff boost . '' The vaginal cuff boost involve small device insert vagina treat back vagina high dose radiation . The applicator similar place large tampon vagina . This internal treatment take 30 minute treatment . This separate external radiation treatment give . While receive radiation treatment , afterwards , also receive chemotherapy paclitaxel . During radiation period , receive paclitaxel vein 1 hour , Days 1 , 8 , 15 , 22 , 29 . Starting 4-6 week radiation treatment finish , receive paclitaxel large dose , give 3 hour time , every 21 day ( 3 week ) . You receive 4 `` cycle '' chemotherapy , cycle last 21 day . You give certain drug 30 minute chemotherapy treatment help control possible side effect , like allergic reaction . These drug include dexamethasone , diphenhydramine ( Benadryl ) , cimetidine . You several test perform throughout study . Before cycle chemotherapy one month last cycle chemotherapy give , quality life symptom assessment form complete . These questionnaire take 15 minute complete . While chemotherapy treatment , test perform chemotherapy treatment . This involve blood ( 1 tablespoon ) drawn routine test , review symptom study staff . Once study treatment , ask return clinic follow-up visit . These visit occur every 3 month 1 year , every 4 month 2 year , every 6 month 2 year , year . At visit , physical pelvic exam perform , along blood ( 1 tablespoon ) drawn routine test . DOC.criteria: 1 . Patient must undergo surgical staging within 8 week study entry . 2 . Patients mixed histology tumor include papillary serous component eligible . 3 . Only patient nonmeasurable disease enter . 4 . Patients may previous chemotherapy radiation therapy . 5 . Patients must estimate life expectancy 12 week great . 6 . Patients must Zubrod performance status less equal 2 . 7 . Patients must adequate bone marrow , renal hepatic function : white blood count ( WBC ) great equal 3000 ; Absolute neutrophil count ( ANC ) great equal 1500 ; Platelets great equal 100,000 ; glutamicpyruvic transaminase ( SGPT ) less equal 2 time upper limit normal ; Total bilirubin less equal 2.5mg/dl . 8 . Patients must sign institutionally approve consent form 1 . Previously treat papillary serous carcinoma either chemotherapy radiation therapy . 2 . Newly diagnose papillary serous carcinoma endometrium , Stage IIIBIV ( patient disease outside pelvis ) . 3 . Patients history malignancy , exception nonmelanomatous skin cancer , unless complete remission therapy disease minimum 5 year . 4 . Patients Zubrod status 3 great . 5 . Patients active infection . 6 . Patients serious intercurrent medical illness . 7 . Patients recent ( within 6 month ) history congestive heart failure , unstable angina myocardial infarction .
